items.longDescription:
- Used compression denim that was jointly developed with Kaihara, the world's leading denim manufacturer.
- Used stretch thread for the wefts, giving them better kickback and compression when worn.
- Good kickback so they are not too tight, and have straighter lines to make your legs look beautiful.
- Used special material that tightens around your stomach with just the right amount for the front pockets.
- Ankle-length, high rise, and skinny straight silhouette make your legs look sleek.
- The stitch colors are relaxed tones, so they can be paired with both casual and dressier styles.
- Legs that look even more slim, with laser processing that was achieved through repeated trial and error.
- In response to customer feedback, we made the fit slightly slimmer up to below the knees, to get lines that are not saggy.
items.name: WOMEN High Rise Skinny Ankle Jeans (Beauty Compression)
items.shortDescription: Added laser processing to this special denim. Your knees and stomach area will look sleek just by wearing these.

- Feels smooth against the skin, and despite being a slim and skinny silhouette, they are soft and comfortable when worn.
- Mid-rise with just the right amount of rise and depth, makes it easy to coordinate with.
- We were very particular about the size, shape, and positioning of the back pockets, to make these jeans look even more flattering from behind.
- Used a curve belt at the waist, so that they fit around the hips, and are designed to prevent them from sliding down after a while.
- Conducted study after study to achieve a special processing technology for a black color that does not gather dust.
